home.title: Affordable quality services for small businesses
focus.title: Services
focus.title.second: We design and develop solutions of software simple, secure and of high quality oriented to small business.
focus.focus1.title: Mobile apps
focus.focus1.description: We design and develop solutions mobile, oriented to any platform(IOS, ANDROID,WINDOWS). Optimized development time and cheap economic support because we use the same base code for all platforms.
focus.focus2.title: E-commerce Solutions
focus.focus2.description: We design and develop virtual stores adjusted to the needs your business and oriented to boost the efficiency and profitability of the same. Sell your products in Internet. In record time you will have your store.
focus.focus3.title: Personal Sites
focus.focus3.description: We design and develop personal sites or business used as your card of presentation in Internet. You can choose design and all content you wish show.
focus.focus4.title: Support
focus.focus4.description: We offer complete support in the cycle of life of the aplication, from implementation until start up in production. Also of mantenance and monitorization of the App. We offer to free support by four months and then negotiate its continuity.
aboutus.title: About Us
aboutus.description: We create quality applications oriented to the needs of small business
aboutus.slogan: Innovating and grow with our clients
aboutus.skills.design.description: We specialize in the creation the responsive pages with technologies as HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap y Javascript
aboutus.skills.development.description: Our web solutions is based on the .NET and Java platforms. In mobile solutions we used Xamarin, Apache Cordova, Ionic o Android.
aboutus.skills.maintenance.description: Support 24/7. We recommend that you hosting, database and platform for the implementation of the solution.
aboutus.panagraph1: In ProAFSolutions we provide software and services adapt to your needs, we focus in the development of measure software
aboutus.panagraph2: We are a profesional team with more than ten years in software solutions with goal of reduce the costs and boost the rentability and efficiency the our clients.
aboutus.panagraph3: Our main commitment is offer a quality service and perceive results from the begining of development the software solution.
separator.title1: Necesitas promocionar y vender tus productos.
separator.title2: We create your own virtual store in record time with all necessary tools:
separator.tools1: Management the products (pictures, price, comparisons, reviews, new products)
separator.tools2: Cart (list the products, orders in PDF)
separator.tools4: We migrate your information to the new system. We support database, excels and text files
chat.section.title1: Need help?, any question?  We are here for you
packages.title: Packages
packages.title.subtitle: We have 4 friendly packages for you. Check all the packages and choose the right one for you.
packages.package1.title: E-commerce
packages.package1.section2: Migration of products to our system
packages.package2.title: Mobile apps
packages.package2.section4: Publish the application in Google Play, Apple Store y Windows Store
packages.package2.section5: Easy mantenance (same the business logic shared between the platforms)
packages.package3.title: Web Application
packages.package3.section2: Personalized template (choose the design you wish)
packages.package4.title: Personal Sites
packages.package4.section3: Personalized template (choose the design you wish)
packages.package4.section5: Everything is customizable (colors, contents, pictures, animations, logo)
packages.package4.section6: Creation of profiles on Social network(Linkedin, Facebook,Twitter)
contact.title: Get in touch
contact.title.subtitle: Have any question? Drop us a message. We will get back to you in 24 hours.

contact.form.subject: Subject
